531140.name: All the Delicate Duplicates
531140.description:
All The Delicate Duplicates is a short, experimental single player first-person narrative game.

Story


John, a computer engineer and single father, inherits a collection of arcane objects from Mo, his mysterious relative. Over time, John and his daughter Charlotte begin to realise that these objects have unusual physical properties – and that the more they are exposed to them, the more their reality and memories appear to change.

Features

  • Part game part reading experience with multiple interpretations.
  • Non-linear narrative that pieces together through interactive discoveries in the game world and a text-based backstory.
  • Surreal domestic environments spread across different timelines with open exploration.
  • Mezangelle: a poetic language created by Mez Breeze that stacks layers of meanings into single phrases.

Warnings

All The Delicate Duplicates contains minimal strobe-like effects, minimal to moderate profanity, potentially creepy psychological concepts and themes.
531140.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
